model.description: Model identifier (for example: codex-gpt5.3 or claude-sonnet-4.5).

tool.description: Agent client/tool used (for example: Cursor, ChatGPT, or Claude Code).

project.description: Project or initiative associated with this unit of work.

timestamp.description: When the logged work happened (ISO 8601). Make sure to include current time.

event_type.description: Short event label such as progress_update, milestone_complete, or run_complete.

status.description: State label such as success, failed, blocked, or info.

work_summary.description: Human-readable summary of what was done.

duration_ms.description: Optional elapsed time for this unit of work.
